ComicInfo.Title: World War Wonderland
ComicInfo.Summary:
Calie and Violet have made it back to their adopted home of Wonderland. All that they've built has been destroyed. As the Ace of Spades unleashes the First Red King and his devastating power, the Liddle's last allies fall. World War Wonderland is upon us!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Daniel Leister & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 5 | C | Cover C | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 6 | D | Cover D | Alé Garza & Ula Mos | 7 | E | Cover E | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 8 | F | Diamond Exclusive Foil Variant Cover, Limited to 750 | Martin Able | 9 | G | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Martin Able | 3 | H | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Martin Able | 2 | I | Islander Comics Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Sarah Giardina & Ula Mos | 4 |
